editors.subtitle: EDITOR 01
editors.title: Block Pattern Editor
editors.description: A dedicated visual environment for managing the game's pattern library. Authors can define shapes on a fixed 5�5 grid, directly influencing the piece generation system's complexity and difficulty curve.

features.title: Pattern Registry
features.description: Create and index new shapes instantly.

features.title: Safety Management
features.description: Validates and removes unused patterns without breaking data.

features.title: Data Integration
features.description: Patterns are exported as serialized data for the Generator.

editors.label: EDITOR 02
editors.title: Game Theme List
editors.description: A centralized configuration tool for visual identity management. By separating aesthetic variables from gameplay logic, themes allow for global color swaps across the board, UI, and particle systems.

features.title: Global Color Fields
features.description: Direct control over the primary, secondary, and background color palettes.

features.title: Logic-Visual Separation
features.description: Swap entire game skins without modifying core engine code.

features.title: Real-time Preview
features.description: Instantly visualize color changes across the UI hierarchy.

features.title: Dynamic Consistency
features.description: Ensures all generated blocks adhere to the selected theme's color index.
